original: intros p n q x Hprime Hdiv Hn. destruct Hdiv as [q' Heq]. destruct n. - simpl in Heq. rewrite Heq. exists (q * q'). ring. - simpl in Heq. rewrite Heq in Hn. apply power_divides_power in Hdiv. + apply prime_power in Hdiv as [Hdivx | Hdivp]. * apply divides_trans with (power x n) p. ++ exists (power x (q * n)). symmetry. apply power_power_lemma1. ++ apply prime_div_gcd in Hdivx. apply prime_gcd in Hdivx. destruct Hdivx. ** contradict Hn. auto. ** auto. + apply power_lt. apply Hprime. auto. + auto.
